optimization.data_augmentation.msda.blended_dset¶

optimization.data_augmentation.msda.blended_dset(train_ds, n_blended=2, prob=0.5, std=0.1, **kwargs)¶
Parameters

  • train_ds – dataset of training images

  • batch_size – size of batches to return from the generator

  • n_blended – number of examples to blend together

  • image_size – shape of the input image tensor

  • prefetch – number of examples to pre fetch from disk

  • prob – probability of repacing a training batch with a convex combination of n_blended

  • std – standard deviation of (mean 0) gaussian noise to add to images before blending (0.0 or equivalently None for no noise)

optimization.data_augmentation.msda.bc_plus
